pci_projects_project_discovery_activate_: Activate your project by adding a payment method and get
You are currently in Discovery mode. By activating your project, you can start your cloud resources in minutes.
Your project is being activated and verified by our teams. You will receive a confirmation email once this is completed.

Based on an analysis of the data related to the activation of your project, we believe that it does not meet all the necessary guarantees in terms of security. You can contact one of our advisors via the help section of your account, to provide us with the information needed to activate your project. If not, this will not be taken into account.
